title: Netclean ProActive Incidents
descriptionMarkdown: This connector uses the Netclean Webhook (required) and Logic Apps to push data into Microsoft Sentinel Log Analytics

dataTypes.name: Netclean_Incidents_CL
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
Netclean_Incidents_CL
            | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)
            | where isnotempty(Time)

value:
Netclean_Incidents_CL
            | summarize LastLogReceived = max(TimeGenerated)
            | project IsConnected = LastLogReceived > ago(30d)

resourceProvider.permissionsDisplayText: read and write permissions are required.

read permissions to shared keys for the workspace are required. [See the documentation to learn more about workspace keys](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-monitor/platform/agent-windows#obtain-workspace-id-and-key).

instructionSteps.description:
>**NOTE:** The data connector relies on Azure Logic Apps to receive and push data to Log Analytics This might result in additional data ingestion costs.
 It's possible to test this without Logic Apps or NetClean Proactive see option 2

1. Download and install the Logic app here:
 https://portal.azure.com/#create/netcleantechnologiesab1651557549734.netcleanlogicappnetcleanproactivelogicapp)
2. Go to your newly created logic app 
  In your Logic app designer, click +New Step and search for “Azure Log Analytics Data Collector” click it and select “Send Data”  
 Enter the Custom Log Name: Netclean_Incidents and a dummy value in the Json request body and click save 
 Go to code view on the top ribbon and scroll down to line ~100  it should start with "Body"  
 replace the line entirly with: 
 
 "body": "{
"Hostname":"@{variables('machineName')}",
"agentType":"@{triggerBody()['value']['agent']['type']}",
"Identifier":"@{triggerBody()?['key']?['identifier']}",
"type":"@{triggerBody()?['key']?['type']}",
"version":"@{triggerBody()?['value']?['incidentVersion']}",
"foundTime":"@{triggerBody()?['value']?['foundTime']}",
"detectionMethod":"@{triggerBody()?['value']?['detectionHashType']}",
"agentInformatonIdentifier":"@{triggerBody()?['value']?['device']?['identifier']}",
"osVersion":"@{triggerBody()?['value']?['device']?['operatingSystemVersion']}",
"machineName":"@{variables('machineName')}",
"microsoftCultureId":"@{triggerBody()?['value']?['device']?['microsoftCultureId']}",
"timeZoneId":"@{triggerBody()?['value']?['device']?['timeZoneName']}",
"microsoftGeoId":"@{triggerBody()?['value']?['device']?['microsoftGeoId']}",
"domainname":"@{variables('domain')}",
"Agentversion":"@{triggerBody()['value']['agent']['version']}",
"Agentidentifier":"@{triggerBody()['value']['identifier']}",
"loggedOnUsers":"@{variables('Usernames')}",
"size":"@{triggerBody()?['value']?['file']?['size']}",
"creationTime":"@{triggerBody()?['value']?['file']?['creationTime']}",
"lastAccessTime":"@{triggerBody()?['value']?['file']?['lastAccessTime']}",
"lastWriteTime":"@{triggerBody()?['value']?['file']?['lastModifiedTime']}",
"sha1":"@{triggerBody()?['value']?['file']?['calculatedHashes']?['sha1']}",
"nearbyFiles_sha1":"@{variables('nearbyFiles_sha1s')}",
"externalIP":"@{triggerBody()?['value']?['device']?['resolvedExternalIp']}",
"domain":"@{variables('domain')}",
"hasCollectedNearbyFiles":"@{variables('hasCollectedNearbyFiles')}",
"filePath":"@{replace(triggerBody()['value']['file']['path'], '\', '\\')}",
"m365WebUrl":"@{triggerBody()?['value']?['file']?['microsoft365']?['webUrl']}",
"m365CreatedBymail":"@{triggerBody()?['value']?['file']?['createdBy']?['graphIdentity']?['user']?['mail']}",
"m365LastModifiedByMail":"@{triggerBody()?['value']?['file']?['lastModifiedBy']?['graphIdentity']?['user']?['mail']}",
"m365LibraryId":"@{triggerBody()?['value']?['file']?['microsoft365']?['library']?['id']}",
"m365LibraryDisplayName":"@{triggerBody()?['value']?['file']?['microsoft365']?['library']?['displayName']}",
"m365Librarytype":"@{triggerBody()?['value']?['file']?['microsoft365']?['library']?['type']}",
"m365siteid":"@{triggerBody()?['value']?['file']?['microsoft365']?['site']?['id']}",
"m365sitedisplayName":"@{triggerBody()?['value']?['file']?['microsoft365']?['site']?['displayName']}",
"m365sitename":"@{triggerBody()?['value']?['file']?['microsoft365']?['parent']?['name']}",
"countOfAllNearByFiles":"@{variables('countOfAllNearByFiles')}",

}",  
 click save   
3. Copy the HTTP POST URL
4. Go to your NetClean ProActive web console, and go to settings, Under Webhook configure a new webhook using the URL copied from step 3 
 5. Verify functionality by triggering a Demo Incident.
instructionSteps.title: Option 1: deploy Logic app (requires NetClean Proactive)

instructionSteps.description:
Ingest data using a api function. please use the script found on
 https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/azure-monitor/logs/data-collector-api?tabs=powershell 
Replace the CustomerId and SharedKey values with your values
Replace the content in $json variable to the sample data.
Set the LogType varible to **Netclean_Incidents_CL**
Run the script
instructionSteps.title: Option 2 (Testing only)
